context.introduction: Learn the fundamental cooking techniques of Korean cuisine. Discover the importance of knife skills, flavor balance, and essential oils.

sections.title: Knife Skills
sections.content: Precise knife skills are essential for preparing vegetables and meats in Korean dishes.

sections.title: Flavor Balance
sections.content: Korean cuisine seeks harmony between sweet, salty, spicy, and sour flavors.

sections.title: Essential Oils
sections.content: Sesame oil and perilla oil are commonly used to add aroma and depth to Korean dishes.

sections.title: Technique Tips
listItems: Cut ingredients evenly for even cooking
Add oils at the end for best aroma
